title: I bought rune pages and now they are gone.
body:
I logged in today to find out that my rune pages are gone, I tried restarting and it was still gone. this also happened to some of my skins a long time ago.
Please help.

replies.body: Hey, I do see you have a history of purchased rune pages so it's really strange to see that they're missing.  I looked into this for you and saw the same thing.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get a chance so we can take a closer look.  We'll want to see how this happened, and get this fixed up for you.  We'll see you there and get back to you as soon as we can!
